src:
UEFA KOEFICIJENTI: Prestigoše nas Hrvati, večeras bi mogli i Škoti; Partizane, spasavaj
Navijamo protiv Švajcaraca i APOEL-a...

07 Nov 2019

Možda nije pravo vreme da svodimo račune za ovo evropsko kolo - Partizan večeras može da barem malo popravi situaciju - ali negativan trend kada su u pitanju UEFA koeficijenti nastavljen je. Govorimo, naravno, o srpskim klubovima i našoj situaciji na rang-listi nacionalnih šampionata.
Crvena zvezda ni u drugom duelu sa Totenhemom nije uspela da "štrpne" makar bod, pa iz tog dvomeča nije bilo priloga za nacionalni koeficijent. Uzimajući u obzir snagu viceprvaka Evrope nije to nikakva tragedija, ali pored toga što se Zvezda nije omrsila (baš kao ni Partizan u prvom meču sa Mančester Junajtedom), ni ostali rezultati nisu nam išli naruku. Pre dve nedelje Seltik je dobio Lacio, Rendžers uzeo bod u Portu, Bazel tukao Hetafe, Jang Bojsi bili bolji od Fajenorda, Dinamo se dočepao remija u Donjecku... Na sve to, Modri su sinoć ponovo bili odlični protiv Ukrajinaca i bili nadomak trijumfa. Ako nešto pozitivno postoji u svemu (po pitanju srpskog fudbala i borbe za to 15. mesto) onda je to što se Šahtjor spasao poraza na Maksimiru u 98. minutu. Ali bez obzira na to Hrvat su nas preskočili i ponovo su na 17. poziciji.
Remi Dinama doneo je Hravatskoj 0,250 bodova (bod za nerešeno, podeljeno s brojem timova date zemlje koji su započeli takmičenje u Evropi, 1/4=0,250), što je bilo dovoljno za skok na listi.
I dok Hrvati možda i ne treba toliko da nas brinu, imajući u vidu da su Dinamu preostala dva vrlo teška susreta u grupi, protiv Atalante i Mančester Sitija (mada su realne šanse da Zagrepčani obezbede evropsko proleće), zemlje čije smo timove gore naveli i te kako nam duvaju zavrat. Dakle, Škoti i Švajcarci.
Seltik večeras ide Laciju na noge i ako pobedi neće samo uzeti dva boda za nacionalni koeficijent, već će osigurati proleće u Evropi, a to znači novu mogućnost za skupljanje bodova. Rendžers dočekuje Porto i ima možda i bolju šansu da "uzme nešto" za Škotsku, a takođe je u igri za plasman u drugu fazu. Samo jedan remi ova dva tima, Seltika ili Rendžersa, značio bi pad Srbije za još jednu poziciju. naše zemlja trenutno je na 24.650 bodova, Škoti na 24.625...



Švajcarcima se svaki bod deli sa pet, zbog toga nešto sporije napreduju, međutim oni jedini u ovom krugu konkurenata za 15. mesto imaju tri tima u igri i 22.800 bodova. Bazel večeras dočekuje Hetafe, Lugano takođe pred svojim navijačima igra protiv Malmea, dok Jang Bojs ide Fajenordu. Teoretski, ta tri tima mogla bi da uzmu šest bodova (tri pobede), što bi za nacionalni koeficijent donelo 1.200 (6/5). U ovom kolu, jasno je, Švajcarci ne mogu da nas prestignu, ali nevolja je u tome što su Bazel i Jang Bojs prvi u svojim grupama i imaju sasvim dobre izglede da prođu dalje.
Dođosmo i do Kiprana, po mnogima najopasnijeg konkurenta. Njihov APOEL danas ima zicer da od Grka preuzme to famozno 15. mesto, za šta će mu biti dovoljan i bod protiv Karabaga (kod kuće), dok ga pobeda vodi na 25.750. Na sve to tim iz Nikozije u narednoj rundi ide Didelanžu u Luksemburg, gde će takođe biti favorit.
Grci poput Srbije stagniraju poslednjih nedelja. Olimpijakos ne može do bodova u Ligi šampiona, a i kada ućari nešto (kao protiv Totenhema) to mu se deli sa pet. Utisak je da Grke već sada možemo da otpišemo iz trke.
Srbija novu šansu ima večeras. Srbija se ponovo uzda u Partizan...

text:
UEFA RATES: We've been overtaken by the Croats, so might the Scots tonight; Partisan, save
We cheer against the Swiss and APOEL ...

07 Nov 2019

It may not be the right time to pave the way for this European round - Partizan can remedy the situation tonight - but the negative trend in UEFA odds has continued. We are talking, of course, about Serbian clubs and our situation in the ranking of national championships.
The Red Star failed to score even a point in the second match with Tottenham, so there was no contribution to the national coefficient from that bout. Considering the strength of the European Vice-Champions, this is no tragedy, but apart from the fact that the Star did not miss (just like Partizan in the first match with Manchester United), the rest of the results did not go wrong. Two weeks ago Celtic got Lazio, Rangers took a point in Porto, Basel beat Getafe, Young Boys were better than Fayenord, Dynamo grabbed a draw in Donetsk ... On top of that, the Wise men again excelled against the Ukrainians last night and were close to triumph . If there is something positive about everything (regarding Serbian football and fighting for that 15th place) then it is that Shakhtar saved itself from defeat at Maksimir in the 98th minute. But regardless, the Croats have skipped us and are back in 17th position.
Remi Dinamo brought 0.250 points to Croatia (a draw for the draw, divided by the number of teams of the given country that started the competition in Europe, 1/4 = 0.250), which was enough to jump the list.
And while the Croats may not have to worry so much, given that Dinamo have two very tough group matches, against Atalanta and Manchester City (though there is a real chance that Zagreb will secure a European spring), the countries whose teams we have listed above and and how they blow our heads. So, the Scots and the Swiss.
Celtic are taking Lazio to their feet tonight and if the victory not only takes two points for the national coefficient, it will also secure a spring in Europe, which means a new opportunity to collect points. The Rangers welcome Porto and may have a better chance of “taking something” for Scotland, and are also in play for the second phase placement. Just one draw from these two teams, Celtic or Rangers, would mean the fall of Serbia for another position. our country is currently at 24,650 points, Scots at 24,625 ...



For the Swiss, each point is divided by five, which is why they advance slightly more slowly, however they are the only ones in this round of competitors for 15th place to have three teams in the game and 22,800 points. Basel welcomes Getafe tonight, Lugano also plays against Malmo in front of his fans, while Young Boys goes to Fayenord. Theoretically, these three teams could take six points (three wins), which would bring 1,200 (6/5) for the national coefficient. In this round, it's clear, the Swiss can't get past us, but the trouble is that Basel and Young Boys are first in their groups and have a pretty good chance of moving on.
We also came to Kipran, by many the most dangerous competitor. Their APOEL today has a knack for taking the famed 15th place from the Greeks, for which a point against Karabag (at home) will be enough, while the victory takes him to 25,750. On top of that, the Nicosia team will go Didelange to Luxembourg in the next round, where they will also be the favorites.
Greeks like Serbia have been stagnant in recent weeks. Olympiakos can't score in the Champions League, and even when he strikes something (like against Tottenham), he is divided by five. The impression is that we can already leave the Greeks out of the race.
Serbia has a new chance tonight. Serbia reigns in Partizan ...
